incidents.description: Two vehicles with police lights flashing on side of road in front of Circle K, in front of and behind a sedan. Two men standing on one side of the sedan, one agent on the other side of the sedan.
Arrested at home on November  30. Saw his picture on Facebook under a Busted in Wake County post. Talked with him on December 2 and was told that he was being transferred by ICE to Atlanta.

4 agents in vests, masks, and dark and camo colored clothing pulled someone out of a silver truck parked in front of the apartment building. Another agent ran up as they wrestled with the person being detained. A moment later, a white truck drove up and three agents got out of the truck and went over to the sidewalk where they were holding the person.
